name: digikala affiliate
author: Mohammadreza Rashidpour

sections.description:
This plugin automatically converts Digikala website links to user-specific sales associate links and allows associates to join the site https://panel.affilio.ir/ from sales associate https:// www.digikala.com/ make money, there is no need for complicated work
This plugin is to help the website operators https://panel.affilio.ir/

More information : https://mrrashidpour.ir/
Contact page : https://mrrashidpour.ir/contact-me/
website : https://mrrashidpour.ir/

Store site : https://www.digikala.com/
affiliate site : https://panel.affilio.ir/

محصولات دیجیکالا دات کام را به صورت همکاری در فروش بفروشید و از آن کسب درآمد کنید
Sell ​​Digikala.com products as affiliate sales and earn money from it
sections.installation:
to install the plugin use these steps.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Click on digikala affiliate link on the rightside menu to configure the plugin.
  4. Enter your Links made from the page in the affilio admin panel (https://panel.affilio.ir)
  5. Save the settings
  6. All the links of digital goods in the posts will be automatically changed to your link
